summary: A female inmate is whisked out of prison and into a police guarded hotel until the district attorney can convince her to testify against the mob in the upcoming trial.
cast: Ginger Rogers|Edward G. Robinson|Brian Keith|Lucy Marlow|Lorne Greene|Katherine Anderson|Allen Nourse|Peter Leeds|Doye O'Dell|Eve McVeagh|Dean Cromer|Tom De Graffenreid|Kevin Enright|Frank Gerstle|Kathryn Grant|Tom Greenway|Joseph Hamilton|Ed Hinton|Bob Hopkins|Norman Keats|John Larch|Alfred Linder|John Marshall|Ken Mayer|Edward McNally|Patrick Miller|Robert Nichols|Erik Page|Bill Raisch|Alan Reynolds|Robert Shield|Gloria Ann Simpson|Helen Wallace|Will J. White|John Zaremba
keywords: witness|women's prison|police protection|district attorney|based on play
title: En un aprieto
